articles.title: Monkey Fever: Know causes, symptoms, prevention tips and more - India TV News
articles.description: Monkey fever, or Kyasanur Forest Disease, poses a significant health threat in endemic regions of South Asia. Understanding the causes, symptoms, and preventive measures is crucial for reducing the risk of infection and mitigating the impact of this potential…
articles.content: Monkey fever, scientifically known as Kyasanur Forest Disease (KFD), is a viral illness transmitted primarily through tick bites. Originating in the dense forests of Karnataka, India, in 1957, KFD ha… [+2783 chars]
